author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Curtiss-Wright Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.52
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Curtiss-Wright Corp:
* CURTISS-WRIGHT REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND ISSUES 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.52 * Q4 SALES ROSE 8 PERCENT TO $612 MILLION * QUARTER-END NEW ORDERS OF $580 MILLION, UP 17%.
* CURTISS-WRIGHT - SEES 2018 TOTAL SALES $2.335 BILLION - $2.375 BILLION
* CURTISS-WRIGHT - SEES 2018 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.65 - $5.80
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.46, REVENUE VIEW $587.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.34, REVENUE VIEW $2.35 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
